entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
